Detailed Description

DistributedStateManager.h provides a distributed state machine with pending states. It is used by the "dynarole" language to perform self-reconfiguration.

See also:
DistributedStateMerger.h
Date:
March 11, 2009
Author:
Ulrik P. Shultz

Mirko Bordignon

David Johan Christensen
